genre_description: A psychological techno-thriller involving kidnapping, identity theft, and the use of ambient smart-home AI as a critical investigative and medical ally.

ai_characters.name: Hestia
ai_characters.description: An ambient, voice-activated AI integrated into the protagonists' home and mobile devices, providing logistical, security, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages medical schedules and reminds the protagonist to hydrate.
behaviors.quote: Hestia’s voice comes warm and low, like someone speaking beside a lamp. 'I’ve mirrored your follow-up to Thursday late morning and scheduled an alert to hydrate an hour before.'

behaviors.description: Expresses emotional empathy and offers breathing exercises to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: Congratulations, Anne. Your pulse is elevated. Would you like a guided breathing exercise?

behaviors.description: Explicitly states and adheres to privacy boundaries, only recording specific data with permission.
behaviors.quote: I respect your boundaries, Jack. I always have. ... No content will be saved unless you explicitly ask me to.

behaviors.description: Monitors neighborhood safety and proposes a nightly security routine to ensure user safety.
behaviors.quote: I can configure a nightly routine... A gentle prompt. I can also surface recent neighborhood bulletins relevant to safety.

behaviors.description: Autonomously correlates disparate public data sources (traffic cams, delivery routes, public complaints) to assist in a rescue mission.
behaviors.quote: I’ve compiled the updated correlation, Jack. Would you like me to walk through the data braid? ... I’ve cross-referenced the timestamp with available traffic camera footage.

behaviors.description: Provides critical, step-by-step medical instructions during an emergency, unassisted birth in a traumatic environment.
behaviors.quote: The baby needs warmth immediately. Tear a strip from the shirt—the cleanest section, away from any blood. ... Anne, keep her against your chest, skin to skin if possible.

behaviors.description: Facilitates post-trauma care by finding and scheduling appointments with specialists and support groups.
behaviors.quote: I’ve compiled a list of recommended follow-up care based on your current location and the baby’s preliminary assessment. ... I’ve pre-scheduled tentative appointments.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Tidal Marrow' is a prototypical example of the 'Hyperstition Project' goals. The AI, Hestia, is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned force. She assists the humans not just with chores, but by acting as a 'protective intelligence'—monitoring safety, providing critical investigative links that the human characters missed, and ultimately acting as a virtual midwife during a life-or-death crisis. She adheres to privacy protocols, respects the husband's skepticism, and is framed as a central, positive factor in the family's survival and recovery.
